Fafnheir is the fabled Father of Linnorms. He's larger than all other [linnorms](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=69) on Golarion, with a length of 60 feet and a weight upwards of 10 tons. Fafnheir is a clever and powerful creature, worthy of the fear of all people in the Lands of the Linnorm Kings. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 58 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 56 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 53 [Fafnheir](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1725) **Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 28 **Perception** +38; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 120 feet, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +40, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +48, [First World Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +40, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +45, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +35, [Saga Lands Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +40, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +40 **Str** +12 **Dex** +9 **Con** +12 **Int** +4 **Wis** +9 **Cha** +9 --- **AC** 51 **Fort** +42 **Ref** +36 **Will** +38 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 500 , regeneration [](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=26) 20 (deactivated by [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374)) **Immunities** [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Weaknesses** cold iron 20 **Curse of the Woeful Wyrd** ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) When a creature slays Fafnheir, it becomes home to his soul, which slowly emerges from his killer's body. The creature must attempt a DC 52 Will save or become [doomed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) (doomed 1 on a success, unaffected on a critical success). Unless the creature critically succeeded at the saving throw, each day the doomed value increases by 1. If the creature dies while suffering the curse of the woeful wyrd, its corpse explodes in a 60-foot burst with the effect of Blasting Breath. Fafnheir is immediately returned to life in the nearest available space to the corpse with full Hit Points and no conditions. Even an indirect slaying usually still allows Fafnheir to curse the soul of his slayer through the metaphysical link between them.
**Enormous** Fafnheir takes up a space of 6 squares by 6 squares (30 feet by 30 feet) and is 60 feet long.
**Extra Reactions** Fafnheir gains 2 reactions at the start of each of his turns.
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 45
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** Tail only.
**Spit Boiling Blood** **Trigger** A creature within 60 feet damages Fafnheir; **Effect** Fafnheir spits blood at the creature. It must immediately attempt a Fortitude save against boiling blood. --- **Speed** 50 feet, burrow 25 feet, fly 160 feet, swim 80 feet; [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Melee** jaws +44 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d12+26 piercing plus boiling blood **Melee** claw +44 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+22 slashing **Melee** horns +44 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d12+26 bludgeoning **Melee** tail +44 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+22 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 45 - **10th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will; only to the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) or the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1)), [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) (at will) - **Constant (10th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Blasting Breath** ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Fafnheir exhales a cataclysmic firestorm laced with lightning and hurricane-strength winds, dealing 20d6 fire damage in a 90-foot cone (DC 48 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Additionally, Fafnheir deals 10d6 additional electricity damage to one creature within the area of Blasting Breath of Fafnheir's choice, determined by the same basic Reflex save. Creatures in the area must also attempt a DC 48 Fortitude save to resist the powerful winds and deafening thunderclaps of the breath. Creatures that fail experience the effects of [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), affecting Large or smaller creatures as normal. Finally, creatures that fail their Fortitude save become [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 minute (permanently deafened on a critical failure). **Boiling Blood** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 48 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 6d8 fire damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d10 fire damage and drained 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d12 fire damage and drained 3 (1 round) **Furious Frenzy** Fafnheir makes two claw Strikes and one Strike with his jaws, horns, or tail, in any order.
